snippet: Separatists assume that their country would get the energy assets, but the British government has been publicly silent, indicating a probable protracted wrangle over the offshore oil and gas fields.
lead_paragraph: Separatists assume that their country would get the energy assets, but the British government has been publicly silent, indicating a probable protracted wrangle over the offshore oil and gas fields.

headline.main: Vote for Independent Scotland Could Prompt Battle Over Energy
headline.print_headline: If Scots Go Independent, North Sea May Be Site of Next Battle
